activities: Personal Information received from the EU/EEA: Personal Information received from the EU/EEA: This certification applies to Openwave Messaging,Inc. and its US subsidiaries. Personal data received by Openwave Messaging may vary depending on the nature of the respective business activities but can include personal data received and processed by Openwave Messaging; (1) for sales and marketing activities; (2) for use in connection with our website (3) to operate, maintain, develop and improve our products and services including our support and maintenance services (4) to enable and effect business transactions (5) for use in a cloud services offering where Openwave Messaging operates as a cloud hosting provider (4) otherwise received on behalf of business customers as a service provider or data processor.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Off-line data, on-line data, manually processed data
recoursemech: Openwave Messaging will co-operate with the EU/EEA Data Protection Authorities (DPAs).
